description:
One of the leading pharmaceutical companies (launch of a new production facility) requires Chief Engineer

 

Key Job Responsibilities:

 

Before startup:

  • Directly responsible for the execution of the project for all civil and interior building works, black utilities (steam, electricity, hot and cold potable water, natural gas, overheated water), firefighting systems, canteen, outdoor works including media supply and discharge of waste and rain & storm water, waste water treatment plant and site infrastructure supply from city and SEZ. 
  • Directly responsible for the  receipt of all necessary approvals and permits required foruninterrupted operation of engineering systems and equipment (for example, operational licenses, limits for energy consumptions, energy consumption reporting, etc);
  • Organizes proper response to requests, audits, inspections from state controlling institutions (for example, sanitary inspections, industrial safety inspections, Rostechnadzor, etc).

After production start-up:

  • Responsible for uninterrupted operation of  engineering systems and equipment, their timely maintenance; for all territory enjoining the plant; for auxiliary structures in order to providecontinuity of production process, quality of products and maintenance of normative HSE standards at optimal costs.
  • Takes over of all Pharma related engineering systems from project team (Clean rooms, HVAC systems, Clean utilities and gases, laboratories systems, BMS & AMS systems, process equipment, CCTV and access control system and SAP PM maintenance and calibration system).
  • Initiates/participates  in measures on improvement of quality, service, reduction of expenses, maintains/manages project teams while determining investment strategies and implementing capital projects. 
  • Scope of duties for this employee includes management of Engineering Department and development of employees' professional skills in order to reach high results.
  • Responsible for all planned and unplanned maintenance / calibration activities on site, including SAMACO (HSE)
  • Site capital and operational expenses (CAPEX  / OPEX) planning and control management – to keep the technological level of engineering systems and equipment fit with operational and production strategy and control costs in case of CAPEX projects.

Qualifications include:


  • Qualified Engineer (mechanical, civil or utility). A higher level business degree is an advantage.
  • At least 7 year’s experience at Chief Engineer position in food or pharma manufacturing sites.
  • Broad technical understanding across most Engineering disciplines (electrical, mechanical, civil, etc.); pharmaceutical Engineering project management / execution experience is an advantage.
  • Expert in contract / procurement / project organization skills. 
  • Fluent Russian and Upper-intermediate English. 
  • Exceptional communicator; ability to influence project employees and external contract staff to deliver project goals to company requirements; ability to operate and perform in a team and matrix type organization; flexible to be able to assist and execute projects under extreme pressure constraints; very good leadership skills

What is offered:


  • Competitive salary, rewarding compensation package
  • Company provides local voluntary medical insurance (including children) and lunch compensation
  • Сompensation for private car costs or a corporate car
  • Accident insurance
  • Excellent opportunities for professional development
name: Chief Engineer/Главный инженер
